item.title: 2. Implementing the Parser
item.author: nick@aptiv.co.nz (Nick Larsen)
item.description: Now that we have the gernerated code, and have verified the parse tree, we can now move on to writing code to interpret out StupidLang script.

item.title: 1. Simple grammar to define loop semantics
item.author: nick@aptiv.co.nz (Nick Larsen)
item.description: For a long time I've been facinated by parsers and in particularly ANTLR (the parser generator).
